about.summary: I'm a full stack developer with expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, React, and microservices architecture. I'm passionate about building scalable applications and infrastructure optimization. My experience spans across AWS cloud technologies, CI/CD pipelines, and API development.

highlights: Led the move to AWS CDK, making infrastructure more manageable and cutting AWS costs by 50%.
Rearchitected AI pipeline orchestration on AWS Step Functions, enabling higher document throughput.
Developed GitHub Actions workflows that auto-generate Python and Go CDKs, reducing manual overhead.
Troubleshot and resolved critical microservice errors under tight deadlines.
Resolved a longstanding bug in the image processing pipeline that had caused corruption issues for months.
Migrated ETL workflows to AWS Step Functions and EC2, enhancing scalability and error recovery.
Developed a real-time ETL pipeline visualization dashboard for better operational monitoring.
Led a team of 3 junior developers, providing technical guidance and code reviews.
Spearheaded the adoption of CI/CD pipelines using Docker and GitHub Actions.
Developed secure, scalable RESTful APIs for video conferencing products.

projects.name: WebMonitors
projects.shortDescription: A SaaS product that lets users automatically monitor websites with visual, HTML, and content-based checks. Serves 100+ users.
projects.detailedDescription: A SaaS product that lets users automatically monitor websites with visual, HTML, and content-based checks. The service notifies users when their monitored websites change or go down.
features: Content change detection for specific elements
projects.businessImpact: Currently serves 100+ users who rely on it for critical website monitoring.

projects.name: ScrapeLoop
projects.shortDescription: A Chrome extension and SaaS that turns any website into a data source with point-and-click scraping.
projects.additionalInfo: Supports webhooks, Google Sheets, and Airtable integrations.
projects.detailedDescription: A Chrome extension and SaaS platform that enables non-technical users to extract data from websites using a simple point-and-click interface, without writing any code.
features: Visual data selector for easy scraping

projects.name: CommodityPriceAPI
projects.shortDescription: A simple JSON API providing real-time and historical prices for 130+ commodities, including Crude Oil, Gold, and Natural Gas.
projects.detailedDescription: A simple JSON API providing real-time and historical prices for over 130 commodities, including Crude Oil, Gold, and Natural Gas.
projects.outcome: This project was successfully acquired, demonstrating its market value and technical merit.
